attributes.additional_details: An immediate ceasefire as a full blown conflict will undoubtly proceed if not handled carefully the goverment seem to be a lot more fairly sided with closer allies such as Ukraine.
attributes.background: We would like our kind goverment to step in jointly with allies for a immediate ceasefire in Palestine. The people there have been opressed for many decades by the Israeli goverment/settlers and are now inoncent lives are being targeted after a provoked retaliation by Hamas the main militant group.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Remain neutral in Israel-Palestine conflict and withdraw support for Israel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648225

Seek a ceasefire and to end Israeli occupation of the West Bank and Gaza Strip: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648292
